modName: The Legend of Qin - Shao Si Ming Follower
summary:
Chinese Style girl.She is frightening death angel,and a indifferent girl.
Shao Si Ming(Priestess of Birth),From China first large 3D Animation The Legend of Qin.
descriptionHtml:
[b]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61886-1-1421853273.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][b][color=#3c78d8][size=5]Thank you for your appreciation.[/size][/color][/b]


[color=#f9cb9c][size=5]Chinese Style girl—Shao Si Ming[/size][/color]


[color=#ff0000][size=5]Beautify face[/size][/color][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][size=5]
[/size][/color][size=4]3DM[/size]：[size=4][url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/space-uid-6024015.html]shenjunchi[/url][/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Attention:[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia]
[size=4]This mod always needs XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Description:[/size][/color]
[size=4]Shao Si Ming(Priestess of Birth),From China first large 3D Animation The Legend of Qin.[/size]
[size=4]She is frightening death angel,and a indifferent girl.  [/size]


[b][color=#ff0000][size=5]Update:[/size][/color]
[size=4]1.1 Update Skin [/size]
[size=4]1.0 Main flies[/size]
[/b]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Info:[/size][/color]
[size=4]Name:Shao Si Ming[/size]
[size=4]Class:Warrior[/size]
[size=4]Body:UNPB TBBP[/size]
[size=4]Level: She will be synchronized same levels withthe owner.[/size]
[size=4]Location:Temple of Kynareth[/size]
[size=4]Starting Health 100[/size]
[size=4]Starting Magicka 100[/size]
[size=4]Starting Stamina 50[/size]

[b][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000][size=5]Spell：[/size][/color]
[size=4]Healing[/size]
[size=4]Fast Healing[/size]
[size=4]GrandHealing[/size][/font][/b]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color]
[size=4]Use NMM to install it or Extract files to skyrim/data.[/size]
[size=4] [/size]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61886-1-1421853115.jpg[/img]
